section.title: Apps for iOS (iPhone and iPod Touch)

program.name: Mart's Lists
program.title: Mart's Lists are smart lists
program.description: Mart's Lists lets you create and manage lists easily. It provides a convenient pad-like way to browse through your lists. If you allow it to, Mart's Lists will learn automatically if an item is required regularly and in which interval. And Mart's Lists supports dictation of your lists to make your life even more comfortable!

program.name: PTInfo Munich
program.title: PTInfo Munich for Mobiles 0.0.1
program.description: A small program for mobile devices to calculate departure and arrival times for public trains in Munich.

program.name: DevCont
program.title: DevCont - Developer's Connector 1.0.1
program.description: Allows you to connect to any computer and any service using TCP/IP or UDP/IP connections to exchange data and debug your sever applications or simply to test internet protocols.

program.name: Japtra
program.title: Japtra - Japanese Trainer 1.0.1
program.description: Japtra asks you Japanese words and phrases to assist you while learning the language. It allows the creation of vocabulary lists and is capable of kana (hiragana and katakana).

program.name: Brainfucked
program.title: Brainfucked - Brainfuck Compiler 1.0.0
program.description: An open source compiler with syntax checking and advanced code optimization for the programming language "Brainfuck".
